subject: Re: [junit] Help needed in Mocking
msgSnippet: However embed an opensource implementation of JMS , say openjms , and start / flush / stop for your testcases? I find that is not that
messageBody:
However embed an opensource implementation of JMS , say openjms , and start
/ flush / stop for your testcases? I find that is not that
slow...http://openjms.sourceforge.net/usersguide/admin.html

On 9/29/06, tester_junit <sujal14@...> wrote:
>
> I am in the process of testing a message driven application.
>
> I would like to test the MessageService ( that communicates through
> JMS with Deployment service to process the request) by Mocking
> JMSobjects.
>
> I am new to easymock and wondering how should I go around Mock JMS
> objects and verify that correct JMS APIs are called
>
>
